projects.title: Sri Lanka Unique Digital Identity System (SLUDI)
projects.description: A blockchain-based national digital identity platform ensuring secure, verifiable, and privacy-preserving identities for citizens using AI and decentralized technologies.
projects.fullDescription: üöÄ Proud to share our final-year group project SLUDI, a blockchain-based national digital identity platform designed to provide secure, verifiable, and privacy-preserving digital identities for citizens, government institutions, and service providers in Sri Lanka. SLUDI addresses the challenges of centralized identity systems by leveraging decentralized technologies, cryptography, and AI-driven biometric verification.
coreFeatures: ‚ú® Digital Identity Wallets & Verifiable Credentials
‚ú® Online & Offline Identity Verification (QR-based)
‚ú® Decentralized Storage using IPFS
‚ú® Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
‚ú® Tamper-proof Identity Framework (DIDs)
achievements: Demonstrated expertise in secure software architecture
Implemented national-scale decentralized identity solution
Integrated AI-based biometric security with blockchain

projects.title: Bus Ticket Booking and Bus Reservation
projects.description: A full-stack bus reservation platform developed with MERN stack, facilitating user-friendly booking processes and seamless ticket management.
projects.fullDescription: ‚ú®üíé This Full stack website üíª developed with MERN stack facilitates user-friendly reservation processes and seamless ticket management for efficient travel planning. The system is divided into client and administrator panels for comprehensive management.
coreFeatures: ‚úÖ Dual Interface: Separate panels for Client and Administrator
‚úÖ Guest Access: Users can view bus details without sign-in
‚úÖ Secure Auth: JWT-based secure sign-up/sign-in
‚úÖ Booking System: Interactive bus seat booking
‚úÖ Customer Care: Instant chat/feedback system
achievements: Developed comprehensive Admin panel for managing routes (Add, Delete, Update)
Implemented booking management system (View, Edit, Delete)
Created seamless ticket management workflow

projects.title: Colombo International Bookfair Reservation Management System
projects.description: A microservices-based stall reservation system featuring interactive maps, real-time availability, and secure payment integration for book publishers.
projects.fullDescription: I‚Äôm excited to share a full-stack development project completed as a team effort for the Software Architecture module. We designed and built a Stall Reservation Management System for the Colombo International Bookfair, enabling book publishers and vendors to reserve stalls online while giving organizers real-time oversight and control.
coreFeatures: ‚ú® Interactive stall map with real-time availability
‚ú® Vendor registration and stall booking (max 3 stalls per vendor)
‚ú® Automated QR code generation and email confirmation via SendGrid
‚ú® Secure payment integration with Stripe
‚ú® Role-based access for vendors and administrators
achievements: Implemented event-driven microservices architecture
Modeled system using C4 model principles
Ensured scalability and clear separation of concerns
